title: Favorite champs?
body:
This has been asked countless times, I'm sure, but I'm curious. What are your guy's favorite champs? Why? What was your best play with them?

Personally, I love Irelia. {{champion:39}} :) Her combonation of melee, bonus damage, and a ranged ult make her a top lane smoothie. I once got so tanky, I was able to get a quadrakill without losing more than 40% of my health. xD So, that's mine, what's yours?

replies.body: {{champion:114}} For sure. She can just get so OP. For my Fiora, there's not a lot of counters to me. The 3 things that get me all the time are Singed, Vladimir, and Frozen Heart.
Awesome. She's definitely my second choice. I think that the thing that makes or breaks a top laner is the ult, ya know, and her ult is definitely what makes her.

Yup. Dodges Darius dunks. Chases the Yi's. Trolls Kennen ult. All the possibilities.

Until someone completely avoids your ult like Jax, Panth, Vlad, or Elise.

Or you get tanked to the death.

:C

Hahah yup

I like to try to make them use those abilities first and then ult, and I'm usually fine, but sometimes they're smart.
my favorite champion is kayle she is amazing with her combo of support and being a great lanebully and just her being alll around awesome {{champion:10}}
I used to play Kayle. :P Always been a fan of hybrid damage. The speed up + long range basic attack + slow was always fun. lol
